file_content.text: Bouris Ulgo's death will be celebrated throughout Alderaan.
I will support the Republic's choice for King. Alderaan enters a new age today.
Bouris Ulgo is a snake. Don't take your eyes off him until he's defanged.
Now is the time. The longer that tick is on the throne, the deeper he digs into Alderaan's veins.
I don't disagree. It's--
Our saviors!
Our savior!
I am truly honored to welcome you to House Panteer. I am Princess Katei, the closest excuse for an heir we have after that monster Ulgo's work.
I was told it was urgent that I speak to you?
What's this about?
Hello.
I need your help. Pull my family's butcher off our throne, and I will throw my support behind the Republic's choice of ruler.
So when do we kill the brute?
Let's get him.
I knew I liked you.
As I was telling Commander Bradel, conventional force won't win this. Bouris Ulgo's army is a match for the Organas and what remains of our Queensguard.
The only chance is for a small force to enter our estates, and take the usurper on.
No one should profit from such crime.
He will face justice.
He should die twice over for every person he killed!
He must face justice, but you cannot live for revenge.
Let go of your anger.
My family is dead. What is my life for, if not revenge?
I'll take him down, as long it's a good Republic man who replaces him.
I see your point.
If you get Bouris Ulgo off the throne, I don't care if you replace him with a Wookiee.
You make it sound so noble and exciting. How could I refuse?
Oh, I suppose....
Don't underestimate Bouris Ulgo. He was once a hero, and he may have lost his morals--but not his training.
Stop being "subtle" and tell me what this involves.
Meaning me.
Let's talk price.
There's already been a transfer to your account. I believe you'll find it sufficient.
Bouris Ulgo's barricaded himself inside the throne room with his most elite guards. Kill him. As long as he lives, he's a threat.
That's not necessary. The man served the Republic for twenty years. Capture him and he'll receive a fair trial offworld.
The world will learn of his crimes and know he was judged fairly.
I will bring him to justice.
Thank you.
Bouris Ulgo is a tyrant now. He deserves no mercy.
He should die.
When he fought for us, he saved millions of Republic lives. Do none of those count when weighed against Alderaan?
That's my choice.
If you are to face him, you're the only one who can make that choice. But do not trust him to yield the throne alive.
This is the private access code for our house's inner sanctum. For what you've done -- for what you will do -- we must trust you with it.
Use it to wrest that dog from our throne and House Panteer will be forever grateful.
I have no time for this.
